### DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE OTHER THAN ADDING/REMOVING TAGS ###
## PLEASE KEEP ALPHABETICAL ORDER ##

on_actions = {
	on_startup = {
		effect = {
			####################
			### PLAYERS ARRAY ###
			####################
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				add_to_array = { # It will automatically add the scope
					array = global.players
				}
			}

			##################
			### TAG ARRAYS ###
			##################

			#Set up European tags array
			add_to_array = { global.european_tags_array = ADL }

			#Set up Balkans tags array
			add_to_array = { global.balkans_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set up Asian tags array
			add_to_array = { global.asian_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set up Middle Eastern tags array
			add_to_array = { global.middle_eastern_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set up China tags array
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set up Indian tags array
			add_to_array = { global.indian_tags_array = TAG }


			#Set up African tags array
			add_to_array = { global.african_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set Up North American tags array
			add_to_array = { global.north_american_tags_array = TAG }			

			#Set up South American tags array
			add_to_array = { global.south_american_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set Up Central American tags array
			add_to_array = { global.central_american_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set Up Caribbean tags array
			add_to_array = { global.caribbean_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set up Oceania tags array
			add_to_array = { global.oceania_tags_array = TAG }

			#Set Up American tags array
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.south_american_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_south_america
				set_country_flag = is_in_americas
				add_to_array = { global.american_tags_array = THIS }
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.central_american_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_central_america
				set_country_flag = is_in_north_america
				set_country_flag = is_in_americas
				add_to_array = { global.american_tags_array = THIS }
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.caribbean_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_caribbean
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.north_american_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_north_america
				set_country_flag = is_in_americas
				add_to_array = { global.american_tags_array = THIS }
			}

			#Set up needed flags
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.european_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_europe
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.asian_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_asia
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.indian_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_india
				set_country_flag = is_in_asia
			}
			#exceptions
			

			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.oceania_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_oceania
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.north_african_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_north_africa
				set_country_flag = is_in_africa
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.african_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_africa
			}
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.middle_eastern_tags_array
				set_country_flag = is_in_middle_east
			}

			########################
			### CONTINENT ARRAYS ###
			########################

			every_state = {
				if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = europe }
					add_to_array = { global.europe_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_on_continent = north_america
							is_on_continent = central_america
						}
					}
					add_to_array = { global.north_america_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = south_america }
					add_to_array = { global.south_america_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = africa }
					add_to_array = { global.africa_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = middle_east }
					add_to_array = { global.middle_east_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = asia }
					add_to_array = { global.asia_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = india }
					add_to_array = { global.india_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = australia } #Oceania
					add_to_array = { global.australia_states_array = THIS }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_on_continent = antarctica }
					add_to_array = { global.antarctica_states_array = THIS }
				}
			}

			###################
			### IMPASSABLES ###
			###################
			every_state = {
				limit = { impassable = yes }
				add_to_array = { global.impassable_states = THIS }
			}

			set_variable = { state.paired_impassable = state.id } #impassable -> state that impassable is paired with

			#######################
			### REGIONAL ARRAYS ###
			#######################

			#Set up mainland Britain array and flags
			#every_state = {
			#	limit = { is_great_britain = yes }
			#	add_to_array = { global.britain_states_array = THIS }
			#}
#
			##Set up British colonial claim array and flags
			#every_state = {
			#	limit = {
			#		NOT = { is_core_of = ANT }
			#		NOT = { state = 321 } #Goa
			#		NOT = { state = 730 } #St. Pierre
			#		NOT = { state = 818 } #Pondicherry
			#		NOT = { state = 830 } #Pattani
			#		NOT = { state = 695 } #Curacao
			#		NOT = { state = 1077 } #Saint Martin
			#		OR = {
			#			#North Africa
			#			is_core_of = EGY
#
			#			#West Africa
			#			is_core_of = NGA
			#			is_core_of = GHA
			#			is_core_of = SIE
#
			#			#East Africa
			#			is_core_of = KEN
			#			is_core_of = UGA
#
			#			#South Africa
			#			is_core_of = SAF
			#			is_core_of = BOT
			#			is_core_of = ZIM
			#			is_core_of = ZAM
			#			is_core_of = MLW
#
			#			#India
			#			is_india = yes
			#			is_core_of = BRM
			#			is_claimed_by = BRM
#
			#			#Southeast Asia
			#			is_core_of = MAL
			#			is_core_of = SAR
#
			#			#Americas
			#			is_core_of = CAN
			#			is_core_of = QUE
			#			is_core_of = WIF
#
			#			#Oceania Asia
			#			is_core_of = AST
			#			is_core_of = NZL
			#		}
			#	}
			#	add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = THIS }
			#}
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 116.id } #Malta
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 118.id } #Gibraltar
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 183.id } #Cyprus
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 269.id } #Hargeisa
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 299.id } #Falkland Islands
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 326.id } #Hong Kong
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 523.id } #SE New Guinea
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 634.id } #Solomon Islands
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 636.id } #Fiji
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 639.id } #Gilbert Islands
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 643.id } #Ellice Islands
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 703.id } #Ascension
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 704.id } #Saint Helena
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 707.id } #Mauritius
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 709.id } #Seychelles
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 720.id } #South Georgia Islands
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 734.id } #Nendo
			#add_to_array = { global.british_colonial_claims = 834.id } #Gambia
#
			#for_each_scope_loop = {
			#	array = global.british_colonial_claims
			#	set_state_flag = british_colonial_claim
			#}
#
			##Set up mainland France array and flags
			#every_state = {
			#	limit = {
			#		OR = {
			#			region = 19 #Northern France
			#			region = 20 #Southern France
			#			region = 164 #Western France
			#		}
			#	}
			#	add_to_array = { global.france_states_array = THIS }
			#}
			#for_each_scope_loop = {
			#	array = global.france_states_array
			#	set_state_flag = is_mainland_france_state
			#}
#
			##Set up French colonial claim array and flags
			#every_state = {
			#	limit = {
			#		NOT = { state = 296 } #Bolama
			#		NOT = { state = 297 } #Rio Muni
			#		NOT = { state = 707 } #Mauritius
			#		NOT = { state = 709 } #Seychelles
			#		NOT = { state = 834 } #Gambia
			#		OR = {
			#			#North Africa
			#			is_core_of = MOR
			#			is_core_of = ALG
			#			is_core_of = TUN
			#			is_core_of = MOR
#
			#			#Subsaharan Africa
			#			is_core_of = MRT
			#			is_core_of = SEN
			#			is_core_of = GNA
			#			is_core_of = MLI
			#			is_core_of = VOL
			#			is_core_of = IVO
			#			is_core_of = NGR
			#			is_core_of = CHA
			#			is_core_of = DAH
#
			#			#Equatorial Africa
			#			is_core_of = CAR
			#			is_core_of = GAB
#
			#			#South Africa
			#			is_core_of = MAD
#
			#			#Indochina
			#			is_core_of = VIN
			#			is_core_of = CAM
			#			is_core_of = LAO
			#		}
			#	}
			#	add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = THIS }
			#}
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 268.id } #Djibouti
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 310.id } #Cayenne
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 635.id } #New Caledonia
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 641.id } #Tahiti
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 694.id } #French Caribbean
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 730.id } #St. Pierre
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 728.id } #Guangzhouwan
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 818.id } #Pondicherry
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 928.id } #East Middle Congo
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 953.id } #Tekeland
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 971.id } #New Cameroon
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 974.id } #Lower Sangha
			#add_to_array = { global.french_colonial_claims = 1037.id } #Inini
#
			#for_each_scope_loop = {
			#	array = global.french_colonial_claims
			#	set_state_flag = french_colonial_claim
			#}
#
		}
	}
}
